name: Desolate Planet
description:
In this pixel art local multiplayer RTS game, you must use all of your abilities to build defences and conquer your opponent with hoards of drones. The player that can best survive the brutal drone dogfights will come out on top. 

CONTROLLERS OF SOME KIND REQUIRED- this will change in the future as I work on the game more, but for now, any commercial pair of controllers will work.

Press "B" in-game to view controls

This was a submission to the Winter Showdown Jam 2022, themed "high score".
